<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2268</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">How the parts of a automobile function</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie die Teile eines Automobils arbeiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment les pièces d'une automobile 
fonctionnent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como as peças de um automóvel funcionam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come le parti di un'automobile funzionano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς τα μέρη μιας αυτοκινητικής λειτουργίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo funcionan las piezas de un automóvil</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation consisting of several parts each of which explains and demonstrates the functioning of a specific part of the car , such as the gears, the steering, the electrical system and the breaks.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning objects</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">applied science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">engineering</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die aus einigen Teilen besteht, 
von denen jedes das Arbeiten eines spezifischen Teils des Autos, wie 
der Zahnräder, der Steuerung, des elektrischen Systems und der 
Brüche erklärt und zeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation se composant de plusieurs pièces 
dont chacune explique et démontre le fonctionnement d'une partie 
spécifique de la voiture, telle que les vitesses, de la direction, du
système électrique et des ruptures.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que consiste em diversas peças cada
uma de que explica e demonstra funcionar de uma parte específica do 
carro, tal como as engrenagens, do steering, do sistema elétrico e 
das rupturas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che consiste di parecchie parti 
ciascuno di cui spiega e dimostra il funzionamento di una parte 
specifica dell'automobile, quali gli ingranaggi, della direzione, del
sistema elettrico e delle rotture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που αποτελείται από διάφορα μέρη κάθε
ένα από τα οποία εξηγεί και καταδεικνύει τη λειτουργία ενός 
συγκεκριμένου μέρους του αυτοκινήτου, όπως τα εργαλεία, η 
οδήγηση, το ηλεκτρικό σύστημα και τα σπασίματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que consiste en varias piezas cada
uno de las cuales explica y demuestra el funcionamiento de una parte 
específica del coche, tal como los engranajes, del manejo, del 
sistema eléctrico y de las roturas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernennachrichten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">angewandte Wissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Technik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
